page.title: 03POPULATION OF UCKFIELD 2.
page.content: The replies showed that about two-thirds of our parents have lived here for ten years or more. Only three were born here. Eight people had moved here from a city(7 from London);16 had come from towns;8 from villages and 4 from totally rural areas.About half of the people had moved here for housing reasons and a quarter to seek or follow work.Also,half of the people are content with the area and three quarters think that their life style has improved since coming here. However, half of the people questioned feel that the local amenities are inadequate;shops and social opportunities being significant areas of discontent. We, the children of the estate would like more play areas and shops.
